title: Bilgewater awards act 1 TF
body: Umm so i'm not sure if this is a bug or not because my friends got it too you see in act 1 on TF you have to get gold from aram games and i am but its not counting it for some reason so if anyone else is getting it i would like to know and some help please.

replies.body:
Hey Kazaragho! 

I also selected TF for Act 1, so nice choice. :D 

Some players have experienced a slight delay when it comes to seeing your updated progress. I noticed you submitted this ~5 hours ago. When you log in again, check out your progress, and if you're still not seeing any gold added, please let me know!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=aaK1fxti,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-24T17:47:59.188+0000)
>
> Hey Kazaragho! 
> 
> I also selected TF for Act 1, so nice choice. :D 
> 
> Some players have experienced a slight delay when it comes to seeing your updated progress. I noticed you submitted this ~5 hours ago. When you log in again, check out your progress, and if you're still not seeing any gold added, please let me know!

I had a similar problem on the Graves side yesterday...  except when I Logged in today it didn't even register me as making the choice in the first place, meaning all the progress I made yesterday was wiped.  It's a hassle since I don't especially enjoy PvP.

Edit:  I made sure to choose Graves again, played a few ARAMs, signed out, signed back in a minute later, and it's still saying I haven't made a choice.  I should have completed Act 1 by now but instead it says I haven't even started.
I also had a problem with my account, it counts my gold however says I've gotten no assists whatsoever, which on ARAM is pretty much impossible to get non lol
You'll need to complete one objective at a time, so if you need to get 25k gold, you'll need to do that first before you can begin tallying for the assists objective.
Ah, thank you very much! I'm on Act 3 now (:
Ohh ok it works now just needed to wait a couple of hours thanks.
